text: (aur inamen donon baaten paayee jaatee hain tab) shueb ne kaha mai chaahata hoon ki apanee donon ladakiyon mein se ek ke saath tumhaara is (mahar) par nikaah kar doon ki tum aath baras tak meree naukaree karo aur agar tum das baras poore kar do to tumhaara ehasaan aur mai tum par mehanat mashakqat bhee daalana nahee chaahata aur tum mujhe insha allaah neko kaar aadamee paoge
